Variables
SharpNeat.​Drawing.​Graph
namespace SharpNeat.Drawing.Graph
GraphViewportPainter
IViewportPainter
IDisposable
public sealed
GraphViewportPainter

Paints graphs to a viewport.

Graph painting involves two main high level steps 1) laying out the nodes of the graph within the specified paint area.  2) Painting the nodes and connections based on the node positions assigned in step 1.
